@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Aura]

A creature entering the emanation or starting its turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:] save against the standard DC for the creature's level or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} as long as it's sickened on a critical failure). While within the emanation, affected creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against diseases and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
